Square Peg is changing the way companies hire and retain great employees. Want to know more?

Why Square Peg? Pricing

"Change hiring, so hiring changes."

Hiring Problems?

Square Peg allows companies to optimize their hiring process and find the right candidates. Using our Fit Score approach, we streamline the hiring process, optimizing your results for culture, skills, and personality.

  • Best In Class Solution
  • Hiring process simplified
  • Reduced Time-to-Hire
  • Employee Retention soars

Square Peg Platform

1

Committed Community

Companies submit job postings to a network of professionals and industry experts.

2

Collective Agreement

The platform allows companies, members, and candidates to each provide rankings for specific role attributes.

3

Elevated Candidates

To ensure the needs of all parties are met, the Square Peg platform elevates the best candiates for the role.
